item.title: PHYS105-recitation-20200416
item.description: This is usually lab time but today it will be recitation. Announcements # Spine problem To find these unknowns we use the sum of the torques Fill out distances Find perpendicular components Solve for $F_m$ Back muscle exerts 2.3 times your weight to hold you up! Total force Just bending over the force you put on your spine is 2.5 times your body weight. Kinematics problem Final angular velocity will be 0
